plot: Meet Eguchi Yoosuke, leader of a high-school biker gang AND the school's handicrafts club. Which means he divides his time between fistfights and fancy needlework. If you think he's weird, wait until you meet the rest of his gang....
opening_theme: "Let's Go Nice Knight" (Ｌｅｔ’ｓ ｇｏ ｎｉｃｅ騎士) by Shō
"Aaa Shōnan" (アーア湘南) by Yōsuke Eguchi
ending_theme: "Shōnan Bakusōzoku" (湘南暴走族) by Shō and the Moon Dogs
"Aoi Emblem" (青いエンブレム) by Gakuro
"10 Ounce Bible" (１０オンスのバイブル) by Hironobu Kageyama
"Ude no Naka no Eien" (腕の中の永遠) by Mana
"Niji no Kanata e" (虹の彼方へ) by Mr.Children
"Sunao ga Ii yo ne" (素直がいいよね) by Junca
insert_song: "Ase no Monologue" (汗のモノローグ) by Hironobu Kageyama (ep 3)
"Boo-Hoo Like a Monkey" by Dangan Bads (ep 7)
"Boys of Eternity" (永遠の少年達) by Kiyotaka Sugiyama (ep 4)
"Hitomi no Naka no Labyrinth" (瞳の中の迷宮) by Mana (ep 8)
"Hohoemi no Area" (微笑みのエリア) by Satoko Yamano (ep 2)
"Memories in My Eyes" by Miyako Endō (ep 10)
"Moshikashtara, Koi" (もしかしたら、恋) by Satoko Yamano (ep 1)
"Ride on Dream - Hashiriya-tachi no Thema" (Ride on Dream~走り屋たちのテーマ~) by Gakuro (ep 1)
"Shiokaze ga Kureta Kagayaki" (潮風がくれた輝き) by Satoko Yamano & Gakuro (ep 5)
